New Records: Anthony Edwards matched his season high with 37 points.
Rudy Gobert grabbed his 9,000th career rebound.
Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored 19 points in the third quarter, including five 3-pointers.
Rudy Gobert recorded three blocks in the game's opening minutes.
The Timberwolves opened the game on a 10-0 run.
The Wolves built a 27-point lead in the second quarter.
Rob Dillingham drilled a 3-pointer, the first of his career, with just under four minutes to play.
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Edwards commented on his performance, saying, 'I'm not like shocked or anything because I worked so hard for it.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Target Center in Minneapolis.
The sold-out Target Center crowd was electric when Rob Dillingham drilled a 3-pointer.
